definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to Christopher Columbus , an explorer who introduced greatly widened contacts between Eurasia and the Americas, or his life or time.
Of or from any of the places called Columbia .
American , from the United States of America

main_definition: Of or pertaining to Christopher Columbus , an explorer who introduced greatly widened contacts between Eurasia and the Americas, or his life or time.
secondary_definitions: Of or from any of the places called Columbia .
( dated or poetic ) American , from the United States of America
